xyz.kotlout.kotlout.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.kotlout.kotlout.controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Controller class used to interface with a user given their userId.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserController(java.lang.String userId)
      Creates a UserController with a Firestore Document Reference a given user doc

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserController

        public UserController(java.lang.String userId)
        Creates a UserController with a Firestore Document Reference a given user doc
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the userdoc to reference with this controller

    • Method Detail

      • registerSnapshotListener

        public void registerSnapshotListener()
        Creates a snapshot listener for the userdoc iff snapshotListenerRef does not already have a listener. The new listener is stored in snapshotListenerRef Unregister this listener with unregisterSnapshotListener when finished using unregisterSnapshotListener()

      • unregisterSnapshotListener

        public void unregisterSnapshotListener()
        Unregisters snapshotListenerRef and sets it to null Should be called once listener is no longer needed

      • setUpdateCallback

        public void setUpdateCallback(androidx.core.util.Consumer<User> updateCallback)
        Sets the callback to be run when user document changes
        Parameters:
        updateCallback - Callback function that will run on every User data update

      • updateUserData

        public void updateUserData(User newData)
        Update the user date with new user data
        Parameters:
        newData - new data to write to the user

      • getUser

        public User getUser()

      • isCurrentUser

        public boolean isCurrentUser()
        Checks if the controlled user is the same as the device user
        Returns:
        True if the given user is the same as the device user, False otherwise

      • getUserDoc

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference getUserDoc()

      • addSubscription

        public void addSubscription(java.lang.String experimentId)
        Subscribe to an experiment. Does nothing if the user is already subscribed to the given experiment.
        Parameters:
        experimentId - A string ID for the experiment.

      • removeSubscription

        public void removeSubscription(java.lang.String experimentId)
        Unsubscribe to an experiment. Does nothing if the user is not subscribed to the given experiment.
        Parameters:
        experimentId - A string ID for the experiment.
